head.title: April 16, 2020 IRCSD COVID-19 Update: A Message from Superintendent Dobmeier - Indian River Central School District

meta.content: April 16, 2020 IRCSD COVID-19 Update: A Message from Superintendent Dobmeier
Please see the attached letter for a message from Superintendent Dobmeier in regard to the next phase of our educational-delivery and student support plan.
